header.description: No header dataset required - report contains only time-series data rows

rows.description: Time-series system metrics collected per minute, including CPU, memory, disk I/O, network traffic, and process-level resource usage

semantics: All columns are direct pass-through from the database table. No filtering parameters are defined. Future enhancements could add optional date range filters on minute_utc.
transformations: No transformations required - direct 1:1 mapping from app_metrics_system_minute table to report rows
